original_text: six of their names on the one stone, and the names of the remaining six on the other stone, in the order of their birth.
korean_text: 그들의 나이대로 여섯 이름을 한 보석에, 나머지 여섯 이름은 다른 보석에 새기라

sentences.original_text: six of their names on the one stone
the names of the remaining six on the other stone
in the order of their birth
